short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just download SVG u can see

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just right click the SVG on the page and click the "Download SVG" to download it as PNG.

NOTICE: Please make sure there is a SVG on the position you trigger "Download SVG".

The default download size is the same as you see on the page. You can config the *Scale factor* by left clicking the extension icon.

Email me if you have any question or suggestion: y122972@gmail.com
